name: Air Fryer BBQ Meatball Melt Rolls
description: Toasty rolls stuffed with quick air-fried meatballs, BBQ sauce, and melty mozzarella, finished with mild salsa and pickles. Fast, kid-friendly, and built for the air fryer.
prep_steps: Preheat air fryer to 200°C/390°F for 3 minutes.
Split the bread rolls and set cut-side up.
Place BBQ sauce in a microwave-safe bowl and warm for 20–30 seconds.
Measure shredded mozzarella and set aside.
cook_steps: Air-fry the meatballs in a single layer for 7–8 minutes, shaking halfway, until heated through and lightly browned.
Toss hot meatballs in the warmed BBQ sauce to coat.
Arrange coated meatballs inside the bread rolls and sprinkle with mozzarella.
Return the filled rolls to the air fryer and cook 2–3 minutes until the cheese is melted and the rolls are toasty.
Top with salsa and pickles. Serve hot.
